title: What happened to Rudy Giuliani? Andrew Kirtzman
description: Long gone his days of public-opinion highs, former New York City mayor Rudy Giuliani is nowadays best known as a fixer for former president President Trump's alleged crimes. Andrew Kirztman, author of “Giuliani: The Rise and Tragic Fall of America’s Mayor," joins Chuck to detail the fall from grace of Trump's highest-profile attorney.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
